newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Kellogg Q4 estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Kellogg Q4 estimate cut.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs analyst Nomi Ghez said Friday she cut her fourth quarter 1996 earnings estimate for cereal maker Kellogg Co to $0.77 a share from $0.81 earlier.
-- Kellogg earned $0.77 a share in the 1995 period.
-- With the cut in the fourth quarter estimate, 1996 projection is now $3.06 a share, down from $3.48 in 1995.
-- Kellogg shares were off 1-1/2 at 66-1/4, after trading as low as 65-1/2 earlier today.
-- Kellogg met with analysts earlier today. "I don't think the presentation delivered any material news, either on the financial or operations side," Ghez said.
-- Ghez said Kellogg expects first quarter earnings to decline from the $0.99 it earned in the 1996 first quarter, but did not quantify the potential drop.
-- Fiscal 1997 earnings are expected to be up by a low double-digit percentage, with the help of reduced number of shares due to stock repurchases.
